Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Nonatthi-novigataduka
Aṭṭhaka
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nonatthi-novigataduka
Aṭṭhaka
397Novigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatipaccayā naanantarapaccayā nasamanantarapaccayā naaññamaññapaccayā sahajāte ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ…pe… .
<< Tikaup Terasaka >>
